generated_body: The article about the Cincinnati Bengals cutting veteran linebacker Preston Brown is likely to provide an overview of the team's decision and the implications for their roster. It may detail Brown's performance and contributions during his time with the Bengals, as well as the reasons behind the team's decision to release him. Overall, readers can expect a straightforward analysis of this development in the Bengals' roster management.
